multi.name: Multi
multi.effect: Attacks with the weapon have multi (2).

status_dazed.name: Status Dazed
status_dazed.effect: Each target hit by the weapon suffers dazed.

status_shaken.name: Status Shaken
status_shaken.effect: Each target hit by the weapon suffers shaken.

status_slow.name: Status Slow
status_slow.effect: Each target hit by the weapon suffers slow.

status_poisoned.effect: Each target hit by the weapon suffers poisoned).

initiative_up.name: Initiative Up
initiative_up.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to your Initiative modifier(Accounted manually).

accuracy_up.name: Accuracy Up
accuracy_up.effect: You gain a +1 bonus to your Accuracy Checks.

magic_up.name: Magic Up
magic_up.effect: You gain a +1 bonus to your Magic Checks.

vitality_up.name: Vitality Up
vitality_up.effect: When you recover HP, you recover 5 extra HP.

healing_up.name: Healing Up
healing_up.effect: Spells you cast that whose effects restore Hit Points will restore 5 extra Hit Points.

spell_up.name: Spell Up
spell_up.effect: Spells you cast deal 5 extra damage.

weapon_up_melee.name: Weapon Up Melee
weapon_up_melee.effect: Your attacks with melee weapons deal 5 extra damage.

weapon_up_ranged.name: Weapon Up Ranged
weapon_up_ranged.effect: Your attacks with ranged weapons deal 5 extra damage.
